extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the process of planning and cultivate useful habits in original game form.Life RPG - excellent tool for planning and motivating. If you want to change yourself and begin new better more productive life - do it and this app will help you.Feel yourself a hero of role play game called Life. Add game elements to your life. Live, play, improve yourself, reach new heights and enjoy scheduling.Application Life RPG also would be interesting for those people that donât have time for games, but they like to play them. Combine pleasant and useful - "upgrade" yourself, increase your productivity.Key features:â¢ game approach to planningâ¢ motivating system of accounting ToDo`sâ¢ widgetâ¢ flexible reminder systemMore about game capabilities:Screen "Habits". You can add here habits that you want to cultivate and those that you want to be out of. Good habits are awarded by money and experience. Following bad habits is punished by penalties. Examples of good habits - "walk up the stairs", "small exercise after each work hour".Screen "ToDo". With the help of Life RPG you can schedule your todo`s- add, watch and make them. This is also awarded. Use Life RPG as a personal assistant. Due to the mechanism of reminders, you will not forget to perform tasks. Users can set a reminder on a certain date and time on the day of the week, once a week, once a month.Screen "Achievements". Earned some coins and donât know what to do with them? Add to this list new things/doings that you like and assign price for them. Award yourself with them. Examples of awards: "watch film", "eat cake". This will be great motivation for you to follow good habits and do your tasks. You can also equip your game avatar. For equipment you get experience bonus. Reach new levels and get other bonuses. Application has a widget.But the most important in Life RPG - is honesty. Be honest with yourself and you`ll do great. Life RPG. Life - game.If you find bug, please wrote to us by email

reviews.title: Good job u guys.
reviews.comment: We have made a good way for kids and adults with managing there habits and there to do lists in a fun RPG manner I wish there was a friending system please make it so also a way to name your self thanks Dan  P.s.can u make it so it has a log in so my younger sibling camt get in to my private thoughts in this app.
reviews.author: Dan Kaminkow

reviews.title: Decent but needs to lose the ads!
reviews.comment: Great app, like it a lot. Would like a paid version to remove the ads though. I don\'t like adverts on my phone!
reviews.author: Andrew Howard

reviews.title: All said and done its fun
reviews.comment: Keeps me thinking of how to better my life.  Novel idea for an app.
reviews.author: Brandon Tittel

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: You should add alarms/reminders to pop up for to do list, especially when set to recur daily. Also, maybe a way to create your own avatar image.
reviews.author: David McDonagh

reviews.title: Neat, simple, fun
reviews.comment: I have transferred most of my to do lists and goals and I am having a fun time. What sets this above other tracking apps seems to be the reward system where you can set the price and award you achieve like a fancy meal, game time, or whatever. What I\'d like to be able to do is group together or move items up or down the list.
reviews.author: Steven Stolpman

reviews.title: The IRL RPG I was looking for
reviews.comment: Overall, it works great. It makes me get things done, despite not really wanting the EXP or Money. I can\'t complain that the interface looks old compared to other apps, because it looks nice in its own way, and because of the Wolf Helm. That said, I would like for there to be Auto-Rotate support, a daily counter against each entry in the Habits pane (I tend to forget if I have done any of them), and some way to export/import the profile.
reviews.author: Pranav Ganapathiraju

reviews.title: Totaly fun.
reviews.comment: I like the rpg element. I suggest this to others who have tasks that need to be met and habits to break. This makes it fun. Just dont lie to yourself.
reviews.author: Rahllen Aarena

reviews.title: Bring back daily occurrence!!!
reviews.comment: So I can easily differentiate between daily tasks and my actual to do list. I love the habits ideas to choose from but I\'d like to be able to decide if it goes in to do or habit. But omg for a nerd like me this app is like mind*blown* how perfect is this???
reviews.author: Rebecca Jean Prescott

reviews.title: Phenomenal
reviews.comment: A terrific substitute for HabitRPG and its laggy mobile site. My only real wishes would be to integrate graphs and task tracking (being able to see what tasks you\'ve done in the past in graphic form), online storage of your data so it can be transfered between phones (not sure if i\'ll have to start all over when i get my new phone, but i think that will be the case) and some social functions (a forum, high scores, chat, etc). Otherwise an excellent app that does exactly what it\'s designed to do.
reviews.author: Israel Gonzalez

reviews.title: Fun out look
reviews.comment: It\'s nice to be able to look back and gauge how productive your day is in a fun way
reviews.author: Rich Fetterly

reviews.title: Buggy and needs more features
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t refreshed in three days, all my todos are still crossed off. Also, scheduling for specific days is pointless if they all still show up on to do list. Daily and to do should still be separate, a Google Task integration with todos would  enjoy amazing, I\'d like to see more features added but right now I\'d settle for the Daily refresh working, it is essentially broken. A shame too, I was going to feature this on my blog. Not anymore.
reviews.author: Marta Daniels

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It could use some sound effects.  Either let me chhose some or some default level up effects.  Other than that great app.
reviews.author: Paul Saltzman

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just started using and am excited about it. Its already working ;) I do wish it separated daily, other daily, weekly etc. to do\'s though.
reviews.author: Tracy McMahon

reviews.title: Neat take on life planner.
reviews.comment: Would like to see an option to add my own images for achievements. Would also like to be able to sync between my phone and tablet.
reviews.author: Jonathan White

reviews.title: Cool To Do App
reviews.comment: That\'s all
reviews.author: Spencer Ford

reviews.title: I like it, it  seems good
reviews.comment: It\'s a good way to be motivated but more rewards need to be added
reviews.author: michael wiggs

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: I mean, i can lie like hell to this thing. I\'m too lazy for it.
reviews.author: Devin Gonzalez

reviews.title: Genius
reviews.comment: Im awarding myself points for giving this app a positive review.
reviews.author: Nate Fanning

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Im at level 7 this is the best app ever
reviews.author: Rihanna Fenty

reviews.title: very nice
reviews.comment: very good \"rpg\" i just wish that you could add your own photo for the item you create
reviews.author: Ry Jackson
